Code preview of 上下文表JBPM4_VARIABLE

drop index IDX_VAR_LOB on JBPM4_VARIABLE;

drop index IDX_VAR_EXECUTION on JBPM4_VARIABLE;

drop index IDX_VAR_TASK on JBPM4_VARIABLE;

drop index IDX_VAR_EXESYS on JBPM4_VARIABLE;

drop table if exists JBPM4_VARIABLE;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: JBPM4_VARIABLE */
/*==============================================================*/
create table JBPM4_VARIABLE
(
DBID_ bigint not null,
CLASS_ varchar(255) not null,
DBVERSION_ integer not null,
KEY_ varchar(255),
CONVERTER_ varchar(255),
HIST_ bit,
EXECUTION_ bigint,
TASK_ bigint,
LOB_ bigint,
DATE_VALUE_ datetime,
DOUBLE_VALUE_ double precision,
CLASSNAME_ varchar(255),
LONG_VALUE_ bigint,
STRING_VALUE_ varchar(255),
TEXT_VALUE_ longtext,
EXESYS_ bigint,
INDEX FK_VAR_TASK (TASK_),
primary key (DBID_)
)
type=InnoDB;

alter table JBPM4_VARIABLE comment '上下文表
';

/*==============================================================*/
create index IDX_VAR_EXESYS on JBPM4_VARIABLE
(
EXESYS_
);

);

);
